text: Lists of Apple software cover different types of software written by Apple Inc. or for Apple computers. They include: ==Apple II== *List of Apple II application software *List of Apple II games *List of Apple IIGS games ==Mobile== *List of iPod games *List of iOS games *List of free and open- source iOS applications ==Macintosh== *List of Macintosh games *List of Macintosh software **List of Macintosh software published by Microsoft
title: Lists of Apple software
